Dialogue_Line: Apples floating in the water. It makes me want some.
I was hungry! I'll keep the seed, that might be useful.
It's so dark down here. Otherwise, maybe I could use this.
I think I can use this... Maybe there's a light source?
Maybe I can plant something?
Perfect!
A sun symbol... Isn't this the kind that changes with sunlight?
Perfect!  Oh look, and a key has appeared!
Now there's a light down here! Maybe I can use that for something.
I wonder if I can use something I have with this light?
In a place like this, it grows just like magic!
Hey, it worked! That thing turned on with the light!
That's not going to do anything.
That's not going to do anything.
That's not going to do anything.
That's not going to do anything.
That's not going to do anything.
Hmm, it's not doing anything.
I can't reach.
I can't reach.
The floor looks a little weak in this spot.
If I just... there!
The light can go through the floor now.
We're done with that.
A tree with fruit!
I'm not hungry, but maybe someone else might be.
Light coming in. The window's too strong to break, though.
Hey, give me that! ...It clearly does not want to.
A fruit for a key. Fair trade.
I don't think that's going to work.
I don't think that's going to work.
I don't think that's going to work.
I can't reach.
Everyone hears stories about being stolen by a witch, and nobody thinks it's going to happen to them.
A monster can go about their life happily, flying in the sky, swimming in the river... and then they're never seen again.
It happened to me. One moment, things were normal. The only warning I got was a shadow before I was swooped up into a bag.
And that's the last one I need!
Gyahahahaha!
That was all I heard...
Where am I...?
This must be the witch's house.
Someone's up there?
Hello?
I'm down here! The witch kidnapped me, too.
I know they like to steal people, but I don't see anyone else...
Can you see a way out of here?
No... Not yet. But we can try.

You're trapped in the witch's house! Control both Aqua & Tori. Click on items on either floor; take things and interact with them. Press Tab to open or close your inventory.  Move by right-clicking the floor. Solve puzzles & try to escape!
You can feel the magic radiating off this. We'll need to break these spells somehow. Maybe he left something in here...
I can't open this. The witch probably put all kinds of enchantments on it.
It opened!
Great, it fit!
I can't reach that door.
I can't reach that door.
It doesn't fit there.
It doesn't fit there.
And so a monster of the air in the attic and a monster of the river in the basement were able to escape.
Better luck next time, Mr. Witch...
Unknown beam state
